item.title: Host a Website on Raspberry Pi
item.description: AWS recently banned Parler from it’s cloud platform, effectively destroying its 10M user app with the flick of a switch. Whether you agree or not, it was within Amazon’s legal rights to make this move. Now imagine you’ve just been kicked off the cloud… where do you go? The Internet is still an open platform, but you’re faced with the ugly prospect of a reverse cloud migration back to on-prem physical servers.
